attributes.action: To debate George Osborne's crude remarks about people on benefits
attributes.additional_details:
George Osborne's remarks about comparing Mike Philpott to those of ordinary tax payers who have either fallen unemployed, disabled, or ill through no fault of their own as unwarrented and as an attack on ordinary people for his own economic failings.

We demand that George Osborne be removed from his office here with and held responsible for this attack on ordinary and innocent people
